description:
If your reaching for a long sleeve jersey, it is probably time to reach for a full-finger glove. Offering more coverage and more protection, the Tessa Gel gloves are great for chillier road rides, or mountain biking anytime. Strategically placed gel padding adds a layer protection between you and vibration. Mixed materials on the back of your hand let you enjoy the airflow, while wicking away sweat.

  • Gel padding smooths out your ride and helps protect your hands in the case of a spill
  • Stretchy synthetic on the back of the and wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • AX Suede™ is light, durable, breathable, and easy to clean
  • Microfibre on the thumb for wiping away sweat and sniffles
  • Touchscreen compatible, so you don’t need to take your gloves off when shooting progress videos
  • Paneled construction hugs the contours of your hands
  • Hook and loop closure at the cuffs, keeps your gloves right where you want them
name: Giro Tessa Gel LF Gloves - Women's
